description: This file defines a class `Env` for managing environment variables within a Flutter application. It includes methods to load environment variables from a `.env` file and provides getters for specific configuration values such as `apiBaseUrl` and `appEnv`. The class ensures defaults are used if environment variables are missing or fail to load.

classes.name: Env
classes.description: A utility class for loading and accessing environment configuration in a Flutter app.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads environment variables from the `.env` file. Should be called early in `main()` before running the app.

methods.name: apiBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the API base URL from environment variables or a default localhost URL if not set.

methods.name: appEnv
methods.description: Returns the application environment (like 'development', 'production') from environment variables or defaults to 'development'.
